projectGridLines.title: Analytics of agricultural data and correlation to Agricultural prices
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Analysing the price variation of selected agri-commodities across different mandis over several weeks to identify key factors that have a bearing on these variations to create actionable sales strategies for farmers and FPOs to improve their realization by 10-15%. Data from several publicly available published sources. The project may need field work to validate assumptions, data points and other factors from the lens of a farmer, FPO or agri-mandi

Skill sets: Advanced Excel, Python, SQL, Tableau, Data Analytics, and insights

Traits expectation: Sharp, Analytical, Driven, Curious

Expected learning: Analytics, Agriculture domain knowledge and related economic impacts.

Specific courses required for project execution: courses related to data analytics and economics

projectGridLines.title: Developing Agri Digital Index (AgDX) for India and the Global South
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The candidate is expected to coordinate the launch of TAC’s Agri Digital Index (AgDX). In this project management role, the candidate is expected to understand the scope of the AgDX project and create a detailed, comprehensive plan for launch of the AgDX – starting from social media management, industry roundtables & events to index formulation. The candidate is expected to be the central PoC responsible for making deliverables happen within defined timelines and be a central coordinator to hold accountability with the core-team and extended network of contributors (volunteers, knowledge experts etc.)

Skill sets: Project Management, Excel, Presentation, Content Writing and event management

Traits expectation: Excellent written and verbal communication, Structured approach and rigor (attention-to-detail), strong stakeholder management and ability to form healthy working relationships.

Expected learning: Candidate will gain rich experience of owning a tangible project with a strong national imperative and bring together a large band of contributors to drive results. This is a platform to set up the candidate for chief-of-staff, entrepreneur-in-residence roles and equip him with a good understanding of the Agriculture space of India and learn how to develop indices in conjunction with The Institute of Competitiveness,
